+    minifier::css::minify(
+        &positions
+            .chunks(2)
+            .map(|x| ::std::str::from_utf8(&v[x[0]..x[1]]).unwrap_or(""))
+            .collect::<String>()
+            .trim()
+            .replace("\n", " ")
+            .replace("/", "")
+            .replace("\t", " ")
+            .replace("{", "")
+            .replace("}", "")
+            .split(' ')
+            .filter(|s| s.len() > 0)
+            .collect::<Vec<&str>>()
+            .join(" "),
+    )
+    .unwrap_or_else(|_| String::new())
